argument.name: height
argument.description: Height of the List. Pass in the value *[ui:undefined]* if you don't want to change the height when setting the width.

page.description: Sets the height and width of the List control.
page.example: var lObj = {dialog.object}.getControl('list1'); lObj.setListSize('200px','300px'); //set both height and width lObj.setListSize('200px'); //set height only lObj.setListSize(undefined,'300px'); //set width only
